verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>: in your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H6666>me<s%>, and in your righteousness.
And <S%H935>enter<s%> not into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%>: for in your <S%H6440>sight<s%> shall no man <S%H2416>living<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%>.

For the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; he has <S%H1792>struck<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H1792>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; he has made me to <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H4285>darkness<s%>, as those that have been <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%>.
Therefore is my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> inside <S%H3820>me<s%>; my heart <S%H8432>inside<s%> me is <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.
I <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>; I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on all your <S%H6467>works<s%>; I <S%H7878>muse<s%> on the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
I stretch <S%H6566>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H5315>you<s%>: my soul thirsts after <S%H5889>you<s%>, as a thirsty <S%H776>land<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

<S%H6030>Hear<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3615>fails<s%>: <S%H5641>hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H4911>me<s%>, lest I be like unto them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

Cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; for in you do I <S%H982>trust<s%>: cause me to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>where<s%> I should <S%H3212>walk<s%>; for I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my soul unto <S%H5315>you<s%>.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord, from my <S%H341>enemies<s%>: I flee unto you to hide <S%H3680>me<s%>.

<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H7522>will<s%>; for you are my <S%H430>God<s%>: your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>; <S%H5148>lead<s%> me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4334>uprightness<s%>.
<S%H2421>Quicken<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord, for your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H6666>sake<s%>: for your righteousness' sake <S%H3318>bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
And of your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> cut <S%H6789>off<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> all them that <S%H6887>afflict<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: for I am your <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
